column1: TaxIdPro allows your customers to specify if the address is a business one or not. TaxIdPro will ask for VAT Number in case of business address, otherwise will ask for Tax Code.
column2: TaxIdPro allows your customers to specify if the address is a business one or not. TaxIdPro will ask for VAT Number in case of business address, otherwise will ask for Tax Code.
